thread.title: Save £5 when you spend £30 at Holland & Barrett
thread.title_full: Save £5 when you spend £30 at Holland & Barrett - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Save £5 when you spend £30 at Holland & Barrett
text: Spend £30 online or in store at Holland & Barrett, and you'll save £5 off your shopping that day. There's no better time to shop at Holland & Barrett, right now many items are included in their Penny Sale including the talk of the town product Bootea 28 day Teatox, Coconut Oil, Manuka Honey, Aloe Vera Gel and customer favourites such as Evening Primrose Oil, Co-Q10 and Glucosamine. Precision Engineered Whey Protein is available in 6 flavours and is now just half price, and their exclusive dr. organic natural beauty range is buy one get one half price. What's more, why not join their 'rewards for life' loyalty programme for free and pick up even more offers every time you shop. Hurry, offers end 3rd September 2015. How to Claim To claim this exclusive offer, see the newspaper on Saturday, August 29, 2015 telegraph.co.uk Follow @telegraph
